Header.success-logout-message: Congratulations, you have successfully log out!

WelcomePage.welcome-text: Explore and interact with APIs effortlessly using our powerful yet lightweight tool combining the best of Postman and GraphiQL. Whether you're working with RESTful APIs or GraphQL endpoints, our platform provides a seamless experience to execute requests, view responses, and manage your API interactions.
WelcomePage.highlights-descriptions: ['Easily perform and manage your RESTful API requests with a user-friendly interface designed for efficiency.', 'Take advantage of our built-in GraphiQL interface for smooth and intuitive GraphQL queries and mutations.', 'Automatically format and organize your queries for improved readability and maintenance.', 'Ensure your data is secure with built-in Firebase authentication.', 'Choose your preferred language for a personalized experience.', 'Easily revisit and rerun previous API requests with our comprehensive history feature.']
WelcomePage.welcome-teams: Used by top teams across the globe
WelcomePage.developers-skills: ['She has experience working with React, Redux, MUI, Next.js (SSR), etc. Always open to new knowledge. Excellent team player and is always ready to help her colleagues.', 'He has a strong background in React and Redux, MUI, Next.js (SSR). Analytical thinking.  Eager to learn new things, works well in a team.', 'She has a solid foundation in React and Redux, MUI, Next.js (SSR). Skilled in code refactoring. Collaborative by nature, flexible and is always eager to expand her skill set.']
WelcomePage.welcome-principles: ['Open to everyone', 'Open source philosophy', 'Teach it forward']

Students can repeatedly attend courses.', 'Our Learning Management System platform and educational materials are publicly available on GitHub and YouTube.', 'Students study at school for free, but we request that they return as mentors to pass on their knowledge to the next generation of students.']
WelcomePage.about-title: Built as Final Task of The Rolling Scopes School
WelcomePage.about-description: RS School is a free and community-based online education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes Community since 2013.
